Rubbish dumped on Road side Needs to be removed pleas

item.title: Waste dumped in Craig's Court behind Silver Cross, 5th July
item.description:
Bags of waste metal vents food bins glass buckets recycling mixed with general waste - why is this tolerated for so long ? please move some of the bins elsewhere make pubs keep their bins on their premises -till collection - they make a lot of money of using public space and never clean yet it's always filthy- why ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Whitehall, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous items flytipped, 5th July

item.title: Nw6 4nb, 5th July
item.description:
There is raw, fetid sewage all along Gascony avenue, it is a severe and urgent health issue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Gascony Avenue, Kilburn, London

item.title: Rubbish dumped all over Craig’s Court, 5th July
item.description:
Bin bags card food bins glass/bottles buckets crushed glass vomit feces - does anyone clean Craig's Court ? are any of the businesses - pubs - ever fined for leaving rubbish everywhere and never cleaning up !!?? the alleyway stinks of urine from last night - does anyone supervise cleaners ? why aren't there bins next to hotel - between commercial properties why is everything dumped in Craig's Court next to residential building - one of very few in this area ? !

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Whitehall, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked prohibited place for many days, 5th July
item.description:
The car has been parked for many days, at the corner, in a dangerous place. Additionally, it’s parked over double yellow line and has even been issued a ticket, however, it doesn’t seem like anyone is coming for it anytime soon. There’s proper parking bays just steps away from where the car is parked, and all neighbourhood know that it is prohibited to park there and tickets are issued, so it makes the situation even more strange.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): White Horse Hill, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unable nto ever charge car because of illegal parking, 5th July
item.description:
The EV vehicle only parking bay with lamp post charger outside 160b Bethune road constantly busy with non electric vehicles and the bay is not enforced. I have not been able to charge my car here for weeks. It is never available for charging day or night.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bethune Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
